meta.title: Birth & Beyond Doula Services
meta.description: Compassionate doula support through pregnancy, birth, and postpartum.

header.title: Birth & Beyond
header.tagline: Compassionate support through your journey into parenthood

about.heading: Supporting You Through Birth
paragraphs: Every birth journey is unique and deserves personalized care. As a certified doula, I provide continuous physical, emotional, and informational support to help you navigate pregnancy, birth, and the early postpartum period.
My approach is centered on your needs, preferences, and comfort. Together, we'll create a birth experience that honors your choices and empowers you through one of life's most transformative moments.

items.title: Prenatal Support
items.description: Regular meetings to prepare for birth, discuss your birth plan, and address any concerns or questions you may have.

items.title: Birth Attendance
items.description: Continuous support during labor and delivery, including comfort measures, position suggestions, and advocacy.

items.title: Postpartum Care
items.description: Follow-up visits to support your recovery, breastfeeding journey, and adjustment to life with your new baby.

items.text: Having her by our side made all the difference. She provided calm, reassuring support exactly when we needed it most. We couldn't have asked for a better birth experience.
items.author: Sarah & Michael

contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.intro: I'd love to hear from you and learn about your birth journey. Reach out to schedule a free consultation and see if we're a good fit.

footer.copyright: Birth & Beyond Doula Services. All rights reserved.

meta.title: Servizi Doula Birth & Beyond

header.title: Birth & Beyond
header.tagline: Supporto compassionevole durante il tuo viaggio verso la genitorialit√†

about.heading: Supporto Durante il Parto
paragraphs: Ogni percorso di nascita √® unico e merita cure personalizzate. Come doula certificata, fornisco supporto fisico, emotivo e informativo continuo per aiutarti a navigare la gravidanza, il parto e il periodo post-parto.

Il mio approccio √® centrato sulle tue esigenze, preferenze e comfort. Insieme, creeremo un'esperienza di nascita che onora le tue scelte e ti d√† forza durante uno dei momenti pi√π trasformativi della vita.

items.title: Supporto Prenatale
items.description: Incontri regolari per prepararsi al parto, discutere il tuo piano di nascita e affrontare eventuali dubbi o domande.

items.title: Presenza al Parto

items.text: Averla al nostro fianco ha fatto tutta la differenza. Ha fornito un supporto calmo e rassicurante esattamente quando ne avevamo pi√π bisogno. Non avremmo potuto chiedere un'esperienza di nascita migliore.
